segments.text: Next to the boy, I see a small girl, eagerly participating in the cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing on the floor, her arm raised, palm open, toward the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her posture is one of pure, unadulterated expectation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear her silent plea for a share of the loot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a certain charm in this conspiratorial sibling moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's not touching the wobbly stool, showing a bit more caution than her brother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her eyes are fixed on the cookie jar, gleaming with anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's fascinating how completely absorbed these children are in their mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I bet they've planned this operation with meticulous detail.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of getting those cookies must be incredibly exciting for her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope the boy doesn't drop them all when he inevitably tumbles.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That would be such a disappointment for her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She really deserves a cookie for her careful waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR
